bug.author: LianShuaiLong
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
when i type following command in the terminal: python pbt_convnet_function_example.py i encountered problem :AttributeError: 'ExperimentAnalysis' object has no attribute 'get_best_checkpoint' can you help me? Ray version and other system information (Python version, TensorFlow version, OS): ray_version:0.8.7 python:3.6.7 torch:1.6.0 torchvision:0.2.1 os:ubuntu16.04.5 LTS <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments): If we cannot run your script, we cannot fix your issue.
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.

comments.comment: Are you using ray_version 0.8.7 while trying to use the master branch examples? If so, consider switching to the 0.8.7 branch and running those examples.
Are you using ray_version 0.8.7 while trying to use the master branch examples? If so, consider switching to the 0.8.7 branch and running those examples. thanks for your reply,
